62f1d51a-552a-4766-86cb-53d5d28daf67.name: Solar Power Subsystem
62f1d51a-552a-4766-86cb-53d5d28daf67.description: Captures solar energy and stores it for system operation with a focus on high efficiency.

embodiment.principle: High-Efficiency Photovoltaic Panels with Advanced Battery Storage
embodiment.description: Uses high-efficiency, flexible solar panels and lithium-ion batteries for superior performance.

physics_models.name: Energy_Budget
physics_models.coding_directives:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.22 * time
physics_models.python_code:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.22 * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

62f1d51a-552a-4766-86cb-53d5d28daf67.verification_plan: Test the energy storage capacity and efficiency under varying solar conditions.

954ec274-6502-494e-a10c-7cb265163ba4.name: Filtration Subsystem
954ec274-6502-494e-a10c-7cb265163ba4.description: Removes contaminants from raw water to produce potable water with advanced filtration.

embodiment.principle: Advanced Ceramic Water Filter with Pre-Treatment
embodiment.description: Utilizes a high-efficiency ceramic filter with additional pre-treatment stages.

physics_models.name: Flow_Rate
physics_models.coding_directives:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.python_code:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity

954ec274-6502-494e-a10c-7cb265163ba4.verification_plan: Test the filtration efficiency and flow rate with contaminated water samples.

f1e65283-b4bf-41c4-bfee-44d7bb7026a9.name: Water Quality Monitoring Subsystem
f1e65283-b4bf-41c4-bfee-44d7bb7026a9.description: Monitors and displays water quality parameters with advanced sensors.

embodiment.principle: Advanced Digital Water Quality Sensors with Real-Time Monitoring
embodiment.description: Incorporates high-accuracy sensors for pH, turbidity, TDS, and additional parameters.

physics_models.name: Sensor_Response
physics_models.coding_directives:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.python_code:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant sensor delay and processing time.
assumptions: Constant sensor delay and processing time.

f1e65283-b4bf-41c4-bfee-44d7bb7026a9.verification_plan: Test the accuracy and response time of the sensors with various water samples.

5434a110-004d-46c0-b8e0-c5322d574251.name: Power Management Subsystem
5434a110-004d-46c0-b8e0-c5322d574251.description: Manages and optimizes power distribution and storage with advanced algorithms.

embodiment.principle: Smart Charge Controller with Advanced Battery Management
embodiment.description: Uses a smart charge controller and advanced battery management system with real-time monitoring.

physics_models.name: Charge_Discharge
physics_models.equations: Battery Level = Initial Charge - (Discharge Rate * Time)
physics_models.coding_directives:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)
physics_models.python_code:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)

5434a110-004d-46c0-b8e0-c5322d574251.verification_plan: Test the power management efficiency and battery life under various load conditions.
